model.strategy

Class RandomStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.strategy.Strategy
      • model.strategy.RandomStrategy

  • public class RandomStrategy
extends Strategy
    This class represents the Random strategy for the artificial intelligences. This strategy generates a random valid position for the player to play next.
    Author:
    PMC

      • simulate

        public int simulate(Color currentColor,
                    int depth,
                    int alpha,
                    int beta)
        Description copied from class: Strategy
        Auxiliary method used to make the needed calculations for caltulateNextMove
        Specified by:
        simulate in class Strategy
        Parameters:
        currentColor - Color of the current player whose turn is being simulated
        depth - Number of turns left to explore after any move is simulated
        alpha - Alpha value for the alpha-beta prune method
        beta - Beta value for the alpha-beta prune method
        Returns:
        The score that will be guaranteed to the player after playing the calculated move
